get.description: Returns all alerts

parameters.name: region_type
parameters.description:
Region type (land or marine)

This parameter is incompatible with the following parameters: area, point, region, zone

parameters.name: point
parameters.description:
Point (latitude,longitude)

This parameter is incompatible with the following parameters: area, region, region_type, zone

parameters.name: region
parameters.description:
Marine region code

This parameter is incompatible with the following parameters: area, point, region_type, zone

parameters.name: area
parameters.description:
State/marine area code

This parameter is incompatible with the following parameters: point, region, region_type, zone

parameters.name: zone
parameters.description:
Zone ID (forecast or county)

This parameter is incompatible with the following parameters: area, point, region, region_type

Returns a textual forecast for a 2.5km grid area

get.description: Returns a list of observation stations usable for a given 2.5km grid area
Returns a forecast icon
Returns a list of icon codes and textual descriptions
Returns a thumbnail image for a satellite region
Returns a list of observations for a given station
Returns the latest observation for a station
Returns the latest observation for a station (use '/latest' instead)
Returns a single observation
Returns a list of observation stations
Returns a list of radar stations

Returns metadata about a given observation station

type.description: A URI reference (RFC3986) that identifies the problem type

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

status.description: The HTTP status code (RFC7231, Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for the request, used for NWS debugging purposes. Please include this identifier with any correspondence to help us investigate your issue.
